title: At Musée d'Orsay, John Singer Sargent, an American in Paris

title: Relationship sex: Why many women still feel pressure to say yes
subhead: Many women have sex with their partners even when they do not want to, out of reluctance to say no, uncertainty about desire, or fear of offending. Together, these reasons sketch the contours of a gray zone of consent.
